about_the_game:
Lunar City Builder is a human-scale city builder set on the Moon! You have been appointed as the head of urban development by the Lunarium Space Agency (LASA) and your mission is to transform the lunar landscape into a metropolis and fostering a thriving community for its inhabitants.

Build the city
At the helm of urban development, your role is to create a city while considering both the technical aspects and the satisfaction of its inhabitants. Place roads strategically to facilitate the movement of the population, judiciously integrate various types of businesses for leisure, public infrastructure to cater to essential needs and incorporate green spaces for make residents coexist harmoniously with nature for their happiness.
Be a talented urban developer !

Build the community
In Lunar City Builder, the only resource available is the inhabitants, so you must choose them carefully. Select the right applicants for your city because Each individual brings a unique set of skills, talents, and backgrounds. In any society, the population is divided into several social classes with different expectations. Your main goal will be to create a society that is pleasant for everyone. But beware, you will be judged by all these categories based on your work.

Creating social ties
As a human-scale city builder, you will have the opportunity to engage with individual residents. Each of them will have their own preferences, schedules, and expectations that you'll need to meet. Just like in real life, people form opinions, whether favorable or not, about you. So choose the right words, thoughtful gestures, and wise decisions to make yourself likable. It's crucial, because they will help you with the city's development by recommending new residents to you. So be a people person !

Embark on the moon and be a Lunar city builder

name: Lunar City Builder Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I7 930 | AMD® FX 6350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I7 930 | AMD® FX 6350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Lunar City Builder is a city-building game where you're in charge to build the city, build a community & solve their problems. You can engage with every residents. They have their own tastes, schedules, and needs that you'll have to meet.
